Let there be love shared amongst us,
Let there be love.

title: Whose offereth praise
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 306
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] Whose offereth praise

Whose offereth praise, glorifieth Me;
Whoso offereth praise, glorifieth Me;
And to Him that ordereth,
His conversation aright
Will I show the salvation of God.

title: In His time, in His time
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 307
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] In His time, in His time

In His time, in His time
He makes all things beautiful,
In His time
Lord, please show me every day
As you're teaching me Your way
That You do just what You say '
In Your time.
In your time, in Your time
You make all things beautiful
In Your time
Lord, my life to You I bring,
May each song I have to sing
Be to You a lovely thing in Your time.

title: All honor, all glory,
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 308
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] All honor, all glory,

All honor, all glory, all power to
You,(2)
Holy Father, we worship You,
Precious Jesus our Saviour,
Holy Spirit we wait on You, (3)
For fire, for fire.

title: As the deer panteth for the water
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 309
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] As the deer panteth for the water

As the deer panteth for the water,
So my soul longs after You.
You alone are my heart's desire,
And I long to worship You

Cho:
You alone are my strength, my shield,
To You alone may my spirit yield,
You alone are my heart's desire,
And I long to worship You.

I want You more than gold or silver,
Only You can satisfy.
You alone are the real joy-giver
And the Apple of my eye.
You're my Friend and You are my
Brother,
Even though You are a King.
I love You more than any other,
So much more than anything.

title: O, for a thousand
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 31
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] O, for a thousand

[Verse 1]
O, for a thousand tongues to sing
My great Redeemer's praise!
The glories of my God and King,
The triumphs of His grace.

[Verse 2]
My gracious Master and my God,
Assist me to proclaim,
To spread through all the earth
abroad, The honors of Thy Name.

[Verse 3]
Jesus! The Name that charms
our fears,
That bids our sorrows cease,
'Tis music in the sinner's ears,
'Tis life and health and peace.

[Verse 4]
He breaks the power of cancelled sin,
He sets the prisoner free;
His blood can make the foulest clean;
His blood availed for me.

[Verse 5]
He speaks and listening to His voice,
New life the dead receive;
The mournful broken hearts rejoice;
The humble poor believe.

[Verse 6]
Hear Him, ye deaf: His praise, ye
dumb,
Your loosened tongues employ;
Ye blind, behold your Saviour come;
And leap, ye lame for joy!

title: Ascribe greatness to our God
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 310
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] Ascribe greatness to our God

Ascribe greatness to our God, the
Rock,
His work is perfect and
All His ways are just, (2)
A God of faithfulness
and without injustice,
Righteous and upright is He; (2)

title: Change my heart, O God
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 311
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] Change my heart, O God

Change my heart, O God,
Make it ever true.
Change my heart, O God,
May I be like You.
You are the Potter, I am the clay,
Mould me and make me, this is what I
pray.

title: Come on and Celebrate,
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 312
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] Come on and Celebrate,

Come on and Celebrate,
His gift of love we will celebrate,
The Son of God who loved us,
And gave us life.
We'll shout Your praise, O King,
You give us joy nothing else can
bring,
We give to You our offering
In celebration praise.
Come on and celebrate, celebrate,
Celebrate and sing,
Celebrate and sing to the King,
Come on and celebrate, celebrate,
Celebrate and sing,
Celebrate and sing to the King.

title: In my heart there rings
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 313
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] In my heart there rings

In my heart there rings a melody
There rings a melody of heavenly
harmony
In my heart there rings a melody
There rings a melody of love
Jesus, Jesus, Jesus, sweetest name I
know
Fills my heart with longing
Keeps me singing as I go

title: In God's green pastures feeding
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 314
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] In God's green pastures feeding

In God's green pastures feeding,
By His cool waters lie,
Soft in the evening, walk my Lord
and I,
All the sheep of His pastures fare,
So wondrously fine. His sheep am I.
Waters cool-In the valley,
Pastures green-On the mountain,
In the evening ' Walk my Lord and I.
Dark the night-In the valley,
Rough the way-On the mountain,
Step by step my Lord and I.
In God's great love rejoicing
By His grace and His power
Great is the love
Walk with my Lord and I
All my life I will love and serve Him
Down herebelow
His child am I

title: In the stars His handiwork I see
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 315
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] In the stars His handiwork I see

In the stars His handiwork I see,
On the wind He speaks with majesty.
Though He ruleth over land and sea,
What is that to me?
I will celebrate Nativity
For it has a place in history
Sure He came to set His people free
What is that to me?
Till by faith I met Him face to face,
And I felt the wonder of His grace
Then I knew that He was more,
Than just a God who didn't care,
Who lived away up there,
And now I walk beside Him day by
day,
Ever watching o'er me lest I stray,
Helping me to find the narrow way,
He's everything to me.

title: It only takes a sparkgoing
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 316
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] It only takes a sparkgoing

It only takes a spark, to get the fire
going,
And soon all those around can warm
up in its glowing.
That's how it is with God's love,
Once you've experienced it,
You'll spread His love to every one;
You want to pass it on.
What a wondrous time is spring,
When all the trees are budding,
The birds begin to sing, the flowers
start their blooming.
That's how it is with God's love,
Once You've experienced it, You want
to sing,
It's fresh like spring; You want to pass
it on.
I wish for you my friend, this happiness,
that I've found,
You can depend on Him, It matters
not where you're bound.
I'll shout it from the mountain top,
I want my world to know,
The Lord of love has come to me,
I want to pass it on.

title: Let Your glory fill this house
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 317
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] Let Your glory fill this house

Let Your glory fill this house,
Let Your praises fill my heart,
Let each vessel offer unto You,
The sacrifice of praise.
For You alone are holy, You alone are
worthy,
You deserve the glory, Jesus, You
alone. (x2)

title: More love, More power
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 318
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] More love, More power

More love, More power, more of
You in my life, (2)
And I will worship You, with all of
my heart,
I will worship You, with all of my
mind,
I will worship You, with all of my
strength,
For You are my Lord, You are my
Lord.
And I will seek Your face, with all of
my heart,
And I will seek Your face, with all of
my mind,
And I will seek Your face, with all of
my strength,
For You are my Lord, You are my
Lord.

title: Righteousness, peace
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 319
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] Righteousness, peace

Righteousness, peace,
and joy in the Holy Ghost,
Righteousness, peace,
and joy in the Holy Ghost,
That's the kingdom of God.
Don't you wanna to be
a part of the kingdom? (3)
Come on ! Come on everybody.
There's love in the kingdom,
So much love in the kingdom,
There's love in the kingdom,
Come on everybody.
There's peace'.
There's joy'..
I'm an heir of the kingdom'

title: O Lord my God
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 32
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] O Lord my God

[Verse 1]
O Lord my God,
when I in awesome wonder,
Consider all the works
Thy hand hath made;
I see the stars,
I hear the mighty thunder,
Thy power throughout
the universe displayed.

[Chorus 1]
Then sings my soul
My Saviour God to Thee,
How great Thou art,
How great Thou art. (Repeat)

[Verse 2]
When through the woods
and forest glades I wander,
And hear the birds
sing sweetly in the trees,
When I look down
from lofty mountain grandeur
And hear the brook
and feel the gentle breeze.

[Chorus 1]
Then sings my soul
My Saviour God to Thee,
How great Thou art,
How great Thou art. (Repeat)

[Verse 3]
But when I think that God,
His Son not sparing,
Sent Him to die,
I scarce can take it in,
That on the cross,
My burden gladly bearing,
He bled and died
To take away my sin;

[Chorus 1]
Then sings my soul
My Saviour God to Thee,
How great Thou art,
How great Thou art. (Repeat)

[Verse 4]
When Christ shall come,
With shout of acclamation,
And take me home -
What joy shall fill my heart,
Then shall I bow
In humble adoration,
And there proclaim,
My God, how great Thou art!

[Chorus 1]
Then sings my soul
My Saviour God to Thee,
How great Thou art,
How great Thou art. (Repeat)

title: Salvation belongs to our God
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 320
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] Salvation belongs to our God

Salvation belongs to our God,
Who sits upon the throne,
And unto the Lamb.
Praise and glory, wisdom and thanks,
Honor and power and strength.
Be to our God, forever and ever, (3)
Amen!
And we the redeemed shall be strong,
In purpose and unity,
Declaring aloud,
Praise and glory, wisdom and thanks,
Honor and power and strength.

title: Take me past the outer courts
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 321
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] Take me past the outer courts

Take me past the outer courts,
Into the Holy place,
Past the brazen altar,
Lord I want to see Your face.
Pass me by the crowds of people,
And the priests who sing their praise,
Lord I hunger and thirst for Your
righteousness,
But it's only found in one place.
Take me into the Holy of Holies,
Take me in by the blood of the Lamb.
Take me into the Holy of Holies,
Take the coal, cleanse my lips, here I
am.

title: Through our God
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 322
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] Through our God

Through our God, we shall do
valiantly,
It is He who will tread down our
enemies,
We'll sing and shout His victory,
Christ is King!
For God has won the victory, and set His
people free,
His word has slain the enemy, the earth
shall stand and that see.
That through.......King (repeat)
Christ is King! Christ is King! Christ is
King!

title: To Him who sits on the throne
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 323
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] To Him who sits on the throne

To Him who sits on the throne,
And to the Lamb,
Be praise and honor and glory and
power (Repeat)
For ever, and ever, and ever amen
(Repeat)

title: We are here to praise You
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 324
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] We are here to praise You

We are here to praise You,
To lift our hearts and sing.
We are here to give You,
The best that we can bring.
And it is our love,
Rising from our hearts,
Everything within us cries 'Abba
Father',
Help us now to give You,
Pleasure and delight,
Hearts and minds and will that say:
'I love You Lord'.

title: We lift up our eyes
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 325
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] We lift up our eyes

We lift up our eyes,
Above the trouble,
In our land, and together we stand,
To declare you as king.
In times like these,
We choose to praise You,
For it's You, it's You who really matters,
You are worthy of all praise.
And we will say that You are good,
All the miracles You've done have
brought us joy,
For we are changed,
And all the hope we have we place in
You right now,
Father we declare that we love You,
We declare our everlasting love for You.

title: We'll walk the land
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 326
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] We'll walk the land

We'll walk the land,
With hearts on fire,
And every step will be a prayer,
Hope is rising, new day dawning,
Sound of singing, fills the air.

Two thousand years,
And still the flame,
Is burning bright across the land.
Hearts are waiting, longing aching,
For awakening, once again.

Let the flame burn brighter,
In the heart of the darkness,
Turning night to glorious day,
Let the song grow louder,
As our love goes stronger,
Let it shine, let it shine.

We'll walk for truth,
Speak out for love,
In Jesus' Name we shall be strong,
To lift the fallen, to save the children,
To fill the nation with Your song.

title: You are my hiding place
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 327
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] You are my hiding place

You are my hiding place,
You always fill my heart,
With songs of deliverance,
Whenever I am afraid,
I will trust in You,
I will trust in You,
Let the weak say,
I am strong, in the strength of the
Lord.

title: You are exalted Lord
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 328
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] You are exalted Lord

You are exalted Lord, above all else,
We place You in the highest place,
Above all else.
Right now where we stand.
And every where we go,
We place You at the highest place,
So the world will know.
You are a mighty warrior,
Dressed in the armour of light,
Crushing the deeds of darkness,
Lead us on in the fight.
Through the blood of Jesus,
Victorious we stand,
We place You in the highest place.
Above all else in this land.

title: I will call upon the Lord
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 329
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] I will call upon the Lord

I will call upon the Lord,
Who is worthy to be praised!
So shall I be saved from mine
enemies
I will call upon the Lord
The Lord liveth, and blessed be my
Rock
May the God of my salvation be
exalted (Repeat)

title: O, worship the King
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 33
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] O, worship the King

[Verse 1]
O, worship the King,
all-glorious above;
O, gratefully sing
His power and His love;
Our Shield and defender,
the Ancient of Days,
Pavilioned in splendour,
and girded with praise.

[Verse 2]
O, tell of His might,
O, sing of His grace,
Whose robe is the light,
whose canopy space;
His chariots of wrath
the deep thunderclouds form,
And dark is His path
on the wings of the storm.

[Verse 3]
The earth with its store
of wonders untold,
Almighty, Thy power
hath founded of old,
Hath stablished it fast
by a changeless decree,
And round it hath cast,
like a mantle, the sea.

[Verse 4]
Thy bountiful care
What tongue can recite?
It breathes in the air,
It shines in the light;
It streams from the hills,
It descends to the plain,
And sweetly distills
In the dew and the rain.

[Verse 5]
Frail children of dust,
And feeble as frail,
In Thee do we trust,
Nor find Thee to fail;
Thy mercies, how tender!
How firm to the end!
Our Maker, Defender,
Redeemer, and Friend!

title: Behold, what manner of love
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 330
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] Behold, what manner of love

Behold, what manner of love
The Father has given unto us (2)
That we should be called the sons of
God. (2)

title: Come let us worship
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 331
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] Come let us worship

Come let us worship and bow down
Let us kneel before the Lord our God
our maker (2)
For He is our God
And we are the people of His pasture
And the sheep of His hand (2)

title: Every day with Jesus
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 332
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] Every day with Jesus

Every day with Jesus,
Is sweeter than the day before
Every day with Jesus
I love Him more and more,
Jesus saves and keeps me,
And He is the One I'm waiting for!
Everyday with Jesus,
Is sweeter than the day before.

title: Surely goodness and mercy
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 333
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] Surely goodness and mercy

Surely goodness and mercy
Shall follow me all the days,
All the days of my life. (Repeat)
I shall dwell in the house of the Lord
forever,
I shall feast at the table spread for me
Surely goodness and mercy shall
follow me
All the days, all the days of my life.

title: For Thou O Lord, art high
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 334
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] For Thou O Lord, art high

For Thou O Lord, art high
Above all the earth
Thou art exalted far above all Gods (2)
I exalt Thee, I exalt Thee
I exalt Thee, O Lord (2)

title: Humble thyself
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 335
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] Humble thyself

Humble thyself in the sight of the Lord
(2)
And He shall lift you up higher and
higher
And He shall lift you up
Up into heaven and He shall lift you up.

title: With my hands lifted up
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 336
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] With my hands lifted up

With my hands lifted up,
And my mouth filled with praise,
With a heart of thanksgiving,
I will bless Thee, O Lord!
I will bless Thee, O Lord! (2)
With a heart of thanksgiving
I will bless Thee, O Lord!

title: I've taken my harp down
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 337
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] I've taken my harp down

I've taken my harp down
From the willow tree
My heart is singing the victory
My past is forgiven
My home is in heaven
All sorrow has gone
The glory has come
And now I'm free.

title: I will serve You
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 338
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] I will serve You

I will serve You, because I love You
You have given life to me
I was nothing before You found me
You have given life to me
Heart aches, broken pieces
Ruined lives, are why You died on
Calvary
Your touch, is what I long for
You have given life to me.

title: Life is wonderful
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 339
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] Life is wonderful

Life is wonderful, yes, it's wonderful!
Life is wonderful now to me,
I let Jesus in, He changed everything
Life is wonderful now.
Since His blessing came into my heart,
Joy unspeakable fills every part,
Now I want to live for my Lord,
Life is wonderful now.

title: One day when heaven was
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 34
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] One day when heaven was

[Verse 1]
One day when heaven was
filled with His praises,
One day when sin was
as black as could be,
Jesus came forth to be
born of a virgin '
Dwelt amongst men,
my example is He!

[Chorus 1]
Living, He loved me;
Dying, He saved me;
Buried, He carried
my sins far away;
Rising, He justified
freely forever:
One day He's coming '
O, glorious day!

[Verse 2]
One day they led Him
up Calvary's mountain,
One day they nailed Him
to die on the tree;
Suffering anguish,
despised, and rejected;
Bearing my sins,
my Redeemer is He!

[Verse 3]
One day they left Him
alone in the garden,
One day He rested,
from suffering free;
Angels came down o'er
His tomb to keep vigil;
Hope of the hopeless,
my Saviour is He!

[Verse 4]
One day the grave could
conceal Him no longer,
One day the stone rolled
away from the door;
Then He arose, over death
He had conquered;
Now is ascended,
my Lord ever more!

[Verse 5]
One day the trumpet
will sound for His coming,
One day the skies
with His glory will shine;
Wonderful day,
my beloved ones bringing;
Glorious Saviour,
this Jesus is mine!

title: My one desire is to know you
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 340
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] My one desire is to know you

My one desire is to know You more
To open up my heart and let You pour,
In to my life what I've been longing for,
My one desire is to know You, Lord.
Oh Lord, there's a crying out in me.
Come and set my spirit free,
I really want to know You,
Cleanse my mind and change my heart,
Help me make a brand new start,
I surrender to Your will.
My one desire is to serve You, Lord,
To open up my heart and let You pour,
Into my life what I've been longing for,
My one desire is to serve You, Lord.

title: Praise God from whom all
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 341
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] Praise God from whom all

Praise God from whom all blessings
flow,
Praise Him all creatures here below,
Praise Him above, ye heavenly hosts;
Praise Father, Son and Holy Ghost.

title: Praise the name of Jesus
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 342
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] Praise the name of Jesus

Praise the name of Jesus ' (2)He's my
rock
He's my Fortress, He's my Deliverer and
in Him
Will I trust, Praise the name of Jesus.

title: Sweet Jesus, sweet Jesus
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 343
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] Sweet Jesus, sweet Jesus

Sweet Jesus, sweet Jesus,
What a wonder you are,
You're brighter than the morning star!
You're fairer, much fairer,
Than the lily that grows by the wayside,
Precious, more precious than gold!

title: Therefore the redeemed
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 344
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] Therefore the redeemed

Therefore the redeemed of the Lord
shall return,
And come with singing unto Zion;
And everlasting joy shall be upon
their head.
They shall obtain gladness and joy,
And sorrow and mourning shall flee
away.
Therefore the redeemed of the Lord
shall return,
And come with singing unto Zion;
And everlasting joy shall be upon
their head.

title: The Lord thy God in the midst
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 345
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] The Lord thy God in the midst

The Lord thy God in the midst of
thee
Is mighty, is mighty!
He will save, He'll rejoice over thee
With joy, with Joy!
He will rest in His love,
He will joy over thee with singing!
The Lord thy God in the midst of thee
Is mighty, is mighty, is mighty!

title: Blessed be the name of the Lord
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 346
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] Blessed be the name of the Lord

Blessed be the name of the Lord
Blessed be the name of the Lord!
Blessed be the name of the Lord most
high!
The name of the Lord is a strong
tower!
The righteous run into it and they are
saved! (2)
Glory to the name of the Lord!. . . .
Holy is the name of the Lord!. . . . .
Honor to the name of the Lord!. . . .

title: Blessing and honor
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 347
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] Blessing and honor

Blessing and honor, glory and power,
Be unto the Ancient of days.
From every nation, all of creation,
Bow before the Ancient of Days.

Every tongue in heaven and earth,
Shall declare Your glory,
Every knee shall bow at Your throne,
In worship, You will be exalted O God,
And Your kingdom shall not pass
away,
O Ancient of Days, (repeat verse and
[chorus])

Your kingdom shall reign over all the
earth,
Sing unto the Ancient of Days.
For none can compare to
Your matchless worth,
Sing unto the Ancient of days.

title: Born again, born to win,
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 348
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] Born again, born to win,

Born again, born to win,
I'm the child of the Most High God.
Born again, born to win,
I'm the child of the King.
I'm a new creation,
I've been washed in His blood,
had a transformation,
Now I'm living in the power of God.

title: Bayete, bayete Inkosi
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 349
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] Bayete, bayete Inkosi

Bayete, bayete Inkosi
Bayete King of Kings
Bayete Bayete Inkosi
Bayete Inkosi king
King of kings

Who, who can match Your greatness
Who, who can know Your power
Who, who can search Your riches
Who can deny You a crown
Lord of all

You are crowned, King of India
You are crowned, Lord of all
You are crowned King of India
Who can deny You a crown
Lord of all.

title: Praise, my soul,
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 35
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] Praise, my soul,

[Verse 1]
Praise, my soul, the King of heaven;
To His feet thy tribute bring;
Ransomed, healed, restored, forgiven,
Who like thee His praise should sing
Praise Him, praise Him! (Repeat)
Praise the everlasting King.

[Verse 2]
Praise Him for His grace and favour
To our fathers in distress;
Praise Him, still the same for ever,
Slow to chide, and swift to bless;
Praise Him, praise Him! (Repeat)
Glorious in His faithfulness.

[Verse 3]
Father-like, He tends and spares us;
Well our feeble frame He knows;
In His hands He gently bears us,
Rescues us from all our foes:
Praise Him, praise Him! (Repeat)
Widely yet His mercy flows.

[Verse 4]
Angels, in the height adore Him;
Ye behold Him face to face;
Sun and moon, bow down before Him;
Dwellers all in time and space:
Praise Him, praise Him! (Repeat)
Praise with us the God of grace.

title: Come into his presence with
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 350
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] Come into his presence with

Come into his presence with
thanksgiving in your heart,
And give Him praise,
and give Him praise;
Come into His presence with
thanksgiving in your heart,

your voices raise.

for as long as I live
Singing what a faithful God Have

title: Light of the world
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 432
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] Light of the world

Light of the world
You stepped down into darkness
Opened my eyes let me see
Beauty that made this heart adore You
Hope of a life spent with You

Here I am to worship
Her I am to bow down
Here I am to say that You are my God
You are altogether lovely
You are altogether worthy
Altogether wonderful to me

King of all days, oh! So highly
exalted
Glorious in heaven above
Humbly You came to the earth You
created
All for love's sake became poor

I'll never know how much it cost
To see my sins upon the cross.

title: Down at Your feet O Lord!
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 433
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] Down at Your feet O Lord!

Down at your feet, O Lord, is the
most high place
In Your presence, LordI seek Your
face (2)
There is no higher calling, no
greater honour,
Than to bow and kneel before Your
throne.
I'm amazed at Your glory, embraced
by Your mercy,
O Lord! I live to worship You!

title: To God be the glory!
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 44
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] To God be the glory!

[Verse 1]
To God be the glory!
Great things He hath done!
So loved He the world
that He gave us His Son,
Who yielded His life
an atonement for sin.
And opened the life-gate
that all may go in.

[Chorus 1]
Praise the Lord! Praise the lord!
Let the earth hear His voice!
Praise the Lord! Praise the Lord!
Let the people rejoice!
Oh, come to the Father,
through Jesus the Son;
And give Him the glory!
Great things He hath done!

[Verse 2]
O, perfect redemption,
the purchase of blood;
To every believer
the promise of God;
The vilest offender
who truly believes,
That moment from Jesus
a pardon receives.

[Verse 3]
Great things He hath taught us,
great things He hath done,
And great our rejoicing
through Jesus the Son:
But purer and higher
and greater will be
Our wonder, our transport,
when Jesus we see!

title: We praise Thee, O God!
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 45
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] We praise Thee, O God!

[Verse 1]
We praise Thee, O God!
For the Son of Thy love,
For Jesus who died,
and is now gone above.

[Chorus 1]
Hallelujah! Thine the glory,
Hallelujah! Amen;
Hallelujah! Thine the glory,
revive us again.

[Verse 2]
We praise Thee, O God!
For Thy Spirit of light,
Who has shown us our Saviour,
and scattered our night.

[Verse 3]
All glory and praise
to the Lamb that was slain,
Who has borne all our sins,
and hath cleansed every stain.

[Verse 4]
Revive us again,
fill each heart with Thy love;
May each soul be rekindled
with fire from above.

title: With harps and with vials
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 46
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] With harps and with vials

[Verse 1]
With harps and with vials
there stand a great throng
In the presence of Jesus,
and sing this new song:

[Chorus 1]
Unto Him who hath loved us
and washed us from sin,
Unto Him be the glory for ever!
Amen.

[Verse 2]
All these once were sinners,
defiled in His sight;
Now arrayed in pure garments
in praise they unite:

[Verse 3]
He maketh the rebel
a priest and a king;
He hath bought us, and taught us
this new song to sing:

[Verse 4]
How helpless and hopeless
we sinners had been
If He never had loved us,
Nor cleansed from our sin!

[Verse 5]
Aloud in His praises our
voices shall ring,
So that others, believing,
this new song shall sing:

title: Ever and always be praise
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 47
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] Ever and always be praise

[Verse 1]
Ever and always be praise,
Eternal Lord to Thee-ever
and always be praise.
Boundless with mercy
Thy arms are encircling us, (repeat)
Ceaseless with praise with
our songs we'll encompass Thee.
Ever and always be praise.

[Verse 2]
Healing He brings in his train,
He knows our weaknesses-healing
He brings in His train.
Sins are forgiven and
our souls are revived again, (repeat)
Sonship restored and
their salvation brought to men.
Ever and always be praise.

[Verse 3]
As east is far from the west,
So far our transgressionsas
east is far from the west,
Have been removed, and
His mercy made manifest, (repeat)
Judgment delivered for all
them that are oppressed.
Ever and always be praise.

[Verse 4]
Life like the grass will decay,
Like flowers will pass away-life like
the grass will decay,
But will not wither where held by His
faithfulness, (repeat)
Faith clingeth fast to
His unwearied changelessness.
Ever and always be praise.

[Verse 5]
Throned in the heavens, He is Lord,
Through ages changelessly-throned in
the heavens He is Lord.
Blessed through all
generations eternally, (repeat)
Bless Him my soul,
in thy Savior rejoicing thee
Ever and always be praise.

title: Lord, thou hast been
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 48
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] Lord, thou hast been

[Verse 1]
Lord, thou hast been our dwelling
place
In generations all.
Before thou ever hadst brought forth
The mountains great and small.

[Verse 2]
Before thou e'er hadst formed the
earth,
And all the world abroad,
Thou e'en from everlasting art
The everlasting God.

[Verse 3]
And now thou to destruction dost
Man that is mortal turn,
And unto them thou sayest, Return
Again, you sons of men.

[Verse 4]
Because a thousand years appear
No more before Thy sight
Than yesterday when it is past,
Or than a watch by night.

[Verse 5]
At morn it flourishes and grows,
Cut down at eve, it's dried.
For by Thine anger we're consumed,
Thy wrath makes us afraid.

[Verse 6]
So teach thou us to number well
Our days, e'en so that we
Our inner man to wisdom's ways
May earnestly apply.

title: My God, how wonderful
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 49
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] My God, how wonderful

[Verse 1]
My God, how wonderful Thou art,
Thy majesty how bright!
How beautiful Thy mercy-seat,
In depths of burning light!

[Verse 2]
How dread are Thine eternal years,
O everlasting Lord,
By prostrate spirits day and night
Incessantly adored!

[Verse 3]
How beautiful, how beautiful,
The sight of Thee must be,
Thine endless wisdom, boundless power,
And awesome purity!

[Verse 4]
O how I fear Thee, living God,
With deepest, tenderest fears,
And worship Thee with trembling hope
And penitential tears!

[Verse 5]
Yet I may love Thee too, O Lord,
Almighty as Thou art,
For Thou hast stooped to ask of me
The love of my poor heart.

[Verse 6]
No earthly father loves like Thee;
No mother, e'er so mild,
Bears and forbears as Thou hast done
With me, Thy sinful child.

[Verse 7]
Father of Jesus, love's reward,
What rapture will it be
Prostrate before Thy throne to lie,
And gaze, and gaze on Thee.

[LANGUAGE] Telugu
[TITLE]  

 
 
 
  

 -  -

title: Amazing grace!
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 5
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] Amazing grace!

[Verse 1]
Amazing grace! How sweet the sound,
That saved a wretch like me!
I once was lost, but now am found,
Was blind, but now I see.

[Verse 2]
'Twas grace that taught my heart to fear,
And grace my fears relieved;
How precious did that grace appear,
The hour I first believed!

[Verse 3]
Thro' many dangers, toils and snares,
I have already come;
Tis' grace hath brought me safe thus far,
And grace will lead me home.

[Verse 4]
When we've been there ten thousand years,
Bright shining as the sun,
We've no less days to sing God's praise,
Than when we first begun.

[Verse 5]
The Lord has promised good to me
His word my hope secures,
He will my shield and portion be
As long as life endures.

title: I sing of the Almighty God
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 50
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] I sing of the Almighty God

[Verse 1]
I sing of the Almighty God,
That made the mountains rise,
That spread the flowing seas abroad,
And built the lofty skies.

[Verse 2]
I sing the wisdom that ordained
The sun to rule the day;
The moon shines full at His command,
And all the stars obey.

[Verse 3]
I sing the goodness of the Lord,
That filled the earth with food;
He formed the creatures with His word.
And then pronounced them good.

[Verse 4]
Lord, how Thy wonders are displayed
Where'er I turn mine eye,
If I survey the ground I tread,
Or gaze upon the sky;

[Verse 5]
There's not a plant or flower below
But makes Thy glories known,
And clouds arise and tempests blow
By order from Thy throne.

[Verse 6]
God's hand is my perpetual guard,
He guides me with His eye;
Why should I then forget the Lord,
Whose love is ever nigh?

title: What shall I render to my God
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 51
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] What shall I render to my God

[Verse 1]
What shall I render to my God
For all His mercy's store?
I'll take the gifts He hath bestowed,
And humbly ask for more.

[Verse 2]
The sacred cup of saving grace
I will with thanks receive,
And all His promises embrace,
And to His glory live.

[Verse 3]
My vows I will to His great name
Before His people pay,
And all I have, and all I am,
Upon His altar lay.

[Verse 4]
Thy lawful servant, Lord, I owe
To Thee whate'er is mine,
Born in Thy family below,
And by redemption Thine.

[Verse 5]
Thy hands created me, Thy hands
From sin have set me free,
Thy mercy that hath loosed my bands
Hath bound me fast to Thee.

[Verse 6]
The God of all-redeeming grace
My God I will proclaim,
Offer the sacrifice of praise,
And call upon His name.

[Verse 7]
Praise Him, ye saints, the God of love,
Who hath my sins forgiven,
Till, gathered to the church above,
We sing the songs of heaven.

title: O Thou whose hand
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 52
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] O Thou whose hand

[Verse 1]
O Thou whose hand hath brought us
Unto this joyful day,
Accept our glad thanks giving,
And listen as we pray;
And may our preparation
For this day's service be
With one accord to offer
Ourselves, O Lord, to Thee.

[Verse 2]
For this new house we praise Thee,
Reared at Thine own command,
For every generous bosom,
And every willing hand;
And now within Thy temple
Thy glory let us see,
For all its strength and beauty
Are nothing without Thee.

[Verse 3]
And oft as here we gather,
And hearts in worship blend,
May truth reveal its power,
And fervent prayer ascend;
Here may the busy toiler
Rise to the things above,
The young, the old, be strengthened,
And all men learn Thy love.

[Verse 4]
And as the years roll onward,
And strong affections twine,
And tender memories gather
About this sacred shrine,
May this its chiefest honour,
Its glory, ever be,
That multitudes within it
Have found their way to Thee.

[Verse 5]
Lord God, our fathers' helper,
Our joy, and hope, and stay,
Grant now a gracious earnest
Of many a coming day.
Our yearning hearts Thou knowest;
We wait before Thy throne;
O come, and by Thy presence
Make this new house Thine own.
Amen.

title: All things bright and beautiful
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 53
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] All things bright and beautiful

[Chorus 1]
All things bright and beautiful,
All creatures great and small,
All things wise and wonderful,
The Lord God made them all

[Verse 1]
Each little flower that opens,
Each little bird that sings,
He made their glowing colours,
He made their tiny wings.

[Verse 2]
The purple-headed mountain,
The river running by,
The sunset, and the morning,
That brightens up the sky.

[Verse 3]
The cold wind in the winter,
The pleasant summer sun,
The ripe fruits in the garden,
He made them everyone.

[Verse 4]
He gave us eyes to see them,
And lips that we might tell,
How great is God Almighty,
Who hath done all things well.

title: We plow the fields, and scatter
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 54
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] We plow the fields, and scatter

[Verse 1]
We plow the fields, and scatter,
the good seed on the land;
But it is fed and watered,
By God's almighty hand;
He sends the snow in winter,
The warmth to swell the grain;
The breezes, and the sunshine,
And soft refreshing rain;

[Chorus 1]
All good gifts around us,
Are sent from heaven above;
Then thank the Lord, oh, thank the
Lord, for all His love.

[Verse 2]
He only is the Maker,
of all things near and far;
He paints the wayside flower,
He lights the evening star.
The winds and waves obey Him,
By Him the birds are fed;
Much more to us, His children,
He gives our daily bread.

[Verse 3]
We thank Thee, then, O Father,
For all things bright and good;
The seed-time and the harvest,
Our life, our health, our food.
Accept the gifts we offer,
For all Thy love imparts;
And, what Thou most desirest,
Our humble, thankful hearts.

title: Oh, the deep, deep love
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 55
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] Oh, the deep, deep love

[Verse 1]
Oh, the deep, deep love of Jesus!
Vast unmeasured, boundless, free;
Rolling as a mighty ocean
In its fullness over me.
Underneath me, all around me,
Is the current of Thy Love;
Leading onward, leading homeward,
To my glorious rest above.

[Verse 2]
Oh, the deep, deep love of Jesus!
Spread his praise from shore to shore;
How He loveth, ever loveth,
Changeth never, nevermore;
How He watcheth o'er His loved ones,
Died to call them all His own;
How for them He intercedeth.
Watcheth o'er them from the throne.

[Verse 3]
Oh, the deep, deep love of Jesus!
Love of every love the best;
'Tis an ocean vast of blessing.
'Tis a heaven sweet of rest.
Oh, the deep, deep love of Jesus!
'Tis a heaven of heavens to me;
And it lifts me up to glory,
For it lifts me up to Thee.

title: Ten thousand thanks to Jesus
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 56
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] Ten thousand thanks to Jesus

[Verse 1]
Ten thousand thanks to Jesus,
Whose life our ransom paid,
Whose blood a full atonement
For all the world has made:
Let every heart adore Him,
Let ev'ry creature sing
Ten thousand thanks to Jesus,
Our Saviour and our King.

[Chorus 1]
Ten thousand thanks,
ten thousand thanks,
We'll praise Him o'er and o'er;
And for the life with Him to live,
Ten thousand, thousand more.

[Verse 2]
Ten thousand hearts to Jesus
How gladly would we give;
Ten thousand lives to Jesus,
Had we so long to live:
Ten thousand tongues shall praise Him,
Ten thousand songs ascend
To Him, our blest Redeemer,
To Him, our dearest Friend.

[Verse 3]
Ten thousand thanks to Jesus
For blessing's ev'ry hour;
Ten thousands times ten thousands,
For love's redeeming pow'r:
And when we hear His welcome
Beyond the rolling sea,
His love thro' endless ages
Our sweetest song shall be.

title: This, this is the God we adore
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 57
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] This, this is the God we adore

[Verse 1]
This, this is the God we adore,
Our faithful, unchangeable Friend;
Whose love is as great as His power,
And neither knows measure nor end.

[Verse 2]
'Tis Jesus, the first and the last,
Whose Spirit shall guide us safe home
We'll praise Him for all that is past,
And trust Him for all that's to come

title: I come to the garden alone
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 58
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] I come to the garden alone

[Verse 1]
I come to the garden alone,
While the dew is still on the roses,
And the voice I hear, falling on my ear,
The Son of God discloses.

[Chorus 1]
And He walks with me, And He talks
with me,
And He tells me I am His own;
And the joy we share as we tarry there,
None other has ever known.

[Verse 2]
He speaks, and the sound of His voice,
Is so sweet the birds hush their singing
And the melody that He gave to me,
Within my heart is ringing.

[Verse 3]
I'd stay in the garden with Him,
Tho' the night around me be falling,
But He bids me go; thro' the voice
of woe,
His voice to me is calling.

title: Jesus, Lover of my soul
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 59
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] Jesus, Lover of my soul

[Verse 1]
Jesus, Lover of my soul,
Let me to Thy bosom fly,
While the nearer waters roll,
While the tempest still is high:
Hide me, O my Saviour, hide,
Till the storm of life be past!
Safe into the heaven guide,
Oh, receive my soul at last!

[Verse 2]
Other refuge have I none,
Hangs my helpless soul on Thee,
Leave, ah, leave me not alone,
Still support and comfort me.
All my trust on Thee is stayed,
All my help from Thee I bring;
Cover my defenceless head
With the shadow of Thy wing.

[Verse 3]
Thou, O Christ, art all I want;
More than all in Thee I find:
Raise the fallen, cheer the faint,
Heal the sick, and lead the blind;
Just and holy is Thy Name,
I am all unrighteousness;
False, and full of sin I am,
Thou art full of truth and grace.

[Verse 4]
Plenteous grace with Thee is found,
Grace to pardon all my sin;
Let the healing streams abound,
Make and keep me pure within.
Thou of life the fountain art,
Freely let me take of Thee,
Spring Thou up within my heart,
Rise to all eternity.

title: And can it be that I should gain
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 6
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] And can it be that I should gain

[Verse 1]
And can it be that I should gain
An interest in the Saviour's blood?
Died He for me, who caused His pain?
For me, who Him to death pursued?

Amazing love ! How can it be
That Thou, my God, should'st die for me?
Amazing love ! How can it be
That Thou, my God, should'st die for me?

[Verse 2]
He left His Father's throne above,
So free, so infinite His grace;
Emptied Himself of all but love,
And bled for Adam's helpless race;

'Tis mercy all, immense and free;
For, O my God, it found out me.
'Tis mercy all, immense and free;
For, O my God, it found out me.

[Verse 3]
No condemnation now I dread;
Jesus, and all in Him, is mine!
Alive in Him, my living Head,
And clothed in righteousness divine,

Bold I approach the eternal throne,
And claim the crown, through Christ my own.
Bold I approach the eternal throne,
And claim the crown, through Christ my own.

[Verse 4]
Long my imprisoned spirit lay;
Fast bound in sin and nature's night,
Thine eye diffused a quickening ray
I woke, the dungeon flamed with light,

My chains fell off, my heart was free
I rose, went forth, and followed Thee
My chains fell off, my heart was free
I rose, went forth, and followed Thee

title: Prayer is the soul's
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 60
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] Prayer is the soul's

[Verse 1]
Prayer is the soul's sincere desire,
Uttered or unexpressed;
The motion of a hidden fire
That trembles in the breast.

[Verse 2]
Prayer is the burden of a sigh,
The falling of a tear;
The upward glancing of an eye
When none but God is near.

[Verse 3]
Prayer is the simplest from of speech
That infant lips can try;
Prayer, the sublimest strains that reach,
The Majesty on high.

[Verse 4]
Prayer is the contrite sinner's voice,
Returning from his ways;
While angels in their songs rejoice,
And cry, 'Behold, He prays!''

[Verse 5]
Prayer is the Christian's vital breath,
The Christian's native air,
His watchword at the gate of death;
He enters heaven with prayer.

[Verse 6]
O Thou, by whom we come to God
The Life, the Truth, the Way;
The path of prayer Thyself hath trod;
Lord, teach us how to pray!

title: Search me, O God
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 61
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] Search me, O God

[Verse 1]
Search me, O God,
and know my heart today;
Try me, O Saviour,
know my thoughts, I pray;
See if there be some
wicked way in me;
Cleanse me from ev'ry sin,
and set me free.

[Verse 2]
I praise Thee, Lord,
for cleansing me from sin;
Fulfill Thy word,
and make me pure within;
Fill me with fire,
where once I burned with shame;
Grant my desire
to magnify Thy name.

[Verse 3]
Lord, take my life,
and make it wholly Thine,
Fill my poor heart with
Thy great love divine,
Take all my will, my passion,
self and pride;
I now surrender: Lord,
in me abide.

[Verse 4]
O Holy Ghost,
revival comes from Thee,
Send a revival,
start the work in me;
Thy Word declares
Thou wilt supply our need,
For blessing now,
O Lord, I humbly plead.

title: Awaz Uthayenge
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 616
[LANGUAGE] Hindi
[TITLE] Awaz Uthayenge

Awaz Uthayenge,
Hum saaz bajayenge
Hai Yishu mahan apna,
Ye geet sunayenge 'Awaz'

[Verse 2]
Sansar ki sundarta men,
Yeh roop to thera hi,
In chand sitaron mein,
Hai akash to thera hi,
Mahima ki teri baten,
Ham sabko batayenge
Hai Yishu mahan apna,
Yeh geet sunayenge 'Awaz'

[Verse 3]
Dil tera khazana hai,
Ek pak muhabbat ka
Thah pa na saka koyi,
Saagar hai thu ulphat ka
Ham teri muhabbat se,
Dil apna sajayenge
Hai Yishu mahan apana,
Yeh geet sunayenge 'Awaz'

[Verse 4]
Na dekh saka hamko,
Thu pap ke saagar mein,
Aur banke manushya aaya,
Aakash se saagar mein
Mukti ka thu data hai,
Ham sabko batayenge,
Hai Yishu mahan apna,
Yeh geet sunayenge 'Awaz'

title: Bolo Jai, milkar Jai
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 617
[LANGUAGE] Hindi
[TITLE] Bolo Jai, milkar Jai

Bolo Jai, milkar Jai,
Bolo jai Yesu ki jai (2)
Bolo jai, jai, jai
[Verse 1]
Prem ki teri yehi reet
Man mein bhar de apni preet
Tere prem ke gayen geet (2) 'Bolo'
[Verse 2]
Khidmat apni le mujhse
Is mandir mein tu base
Hind mein tera naam rahe (2) 'Bolo'
[Verse 3]
Krus par apna khoon baha
Is papi ko di shifa
Man mere tu bol sada (2) 'Bolo'

title: Bulaya, mujhe bulaya
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 618
[LANGUAGE] Hindi
[TITLE] Bulaya, mujhe bulaya

Bulaya, mujhe bulaya
Mere naam se mujhe bulaya
Bulaya mujhe bulaya
Aseem prem se mujhe bulaya.
Bulaya, mujhe bulaya
[Verse 1]
Mai gatha rahunga gungunatha rahunga
Uske sammukh me magan ho jaunga
Sharanagat mai ho jaunga
Sab kuch use arpan kar dunga
'Bulaya'
[Verse 2]
Prati din stuti uski karata rahoon
Darshan pane ko jatha rahoon
Vachan ko man me samatha rahoon
Us ke prem se bharpoor ho jaun.
'Bulaya'

title: Jab se maine pita ko paya
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 619
[LANGUAGE] Hindi
[TITLE] Jab se maine pita ko paya

Jab se maine pita ko paya
Mera jeevan badal gaya Halleluiah (4)
[Verse 2]
Pyara Ishu jab dil me aya
Mera jeevan badal gaya
[Verse 3]
Paap ka mochan jab se paya
Mera jeevan badal gaya

title: Sun of my soul, Thou Saviour
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 62
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] Sun of my soul, Thou Saviour

[Verse 1]
Sun of my soul, Thou Saviour dear,
It is not night if Thou be near:
Oh, may no earth-born cloud arise
To hide Thee from Thy servant'seyes

[Verse 2]
When the soft dews of kindly sleep
My wearied eyelids gently steep:
Be my last thought, how sweet to rest
For ever on my Saviour's breast!

[Verse 3]
Abide with me from morn till eve,
For without Thee I cannot live;
Abide with me when night is nigh,
For without Thee I dare not die.

[Verse 4]
Be near to bless me when I wake,
Ere thro' the world my way I take;
Till, in the ocean of Thy love,
I lose myself in heaven above.

title: Jai jai prabhu Yeshuki
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 620
[LANGUAGE] Hindi
[TITLE] Jai jai prabhu Yeshuki

Jai jai prabhu Yeshuki (2),
Hum ko bachane aaya jagath me
Uski stuti karo ' ah,ha,ha,ha,ha,ha,
oh,ho,ho,ho,ho, ho,
La,la,la,la,la,la, Halleluya Amen.
[Verse 1]
Khoon ki dhara bahati suli se,
Usme dhule sab paap,
Dholo ab tum apne hriday ko,
Usme rahe na daag 'Jai, Jai'
[Verse 2]
Grahan karo tum aaj Yeshu ko,
Prem ki bahati dhar
Usko banalo khewanhara,
naav lagado paar 'Jai Jai'
[Verse 3]
Vapas aata mera Prabhuji,
Le jayega saath
Aasha meri ab tho yahi hai,
Tum bhi chalo mere saath 'Jai Jai'

title: Jo krus pe qurban hai
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 621
[LANGUAGE] Hindi
[TITLE] Jo krus pe qurban hai

Jo krus pe qurban hai
Woh mera Masiha hai
Har zakhm jo uska hai
Woh mere gunah ka hai (2)
[Verse 1]
Is duniya me le aye
Mere hi gunah usko '2
Yeh zulm ' o sitham us per
Mainey hi karaya hai '2'Jo krus'
[Verse 2]
Insan hai woh kabil
Aur sacha Khuda woh hai '2
Woh pyar ka dariya hai
Sachayi ka rasta hai '2 'Jo krus'
[Verse 3]
Deneko mujhe jeevan
Khudh mauth sahi usne '2
Kya khoob hai qurbani
Kya pyar anokha hai '2'Jo krus'

title: Kithna madhur samai hai
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 622
[LANGUAGE] Hindi
[TITLE] Kithna madhur samai hai

Kithna madhur samai hai (2)
Jab mera Yeshu mujhko
Charano me raha bithatha
Mujh ko khali karke
Athma se bhartha jatha.
[Verse 1]
Mujhko hari hari ghas charatha
Jeevan jal bhi pilatha (2)
Mujko hai woh bachatha
Jeevan sukh ko latha 'Kithna'
[Verse 2]
Chahe mai ghor andhkar me chalun
Hani se bhi na darun
Therey sothe aur lathi sey
Man mera shanti hai patha 'Kithna'

title: Krus hai tera Nishan
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 623
[LANGUAGE] Hindi
[TITLE] Krus hai tera Nishan

Krus hai tera nishan,
Aage bade javan
Piche na hatna kabhi,
Yeshu hai teri chattan.
[Verse 1]
Nayaa meri majdhar me doobi
Kaun lagayega paar
Keval Yeshu khe saktha hai - 2
Meri nayaa ki patvar. 'Krus hai'
[Verse 2]
Sab ke liye hai-ye susandesh
Uske pyar ka
Sab ke dilon ka pyara Masiha -2
Raja hai shanti ka. 'Krus hai'

title: Masiha bina, hamara
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 624
[LANGUAGE] Hindi
[TITLE] Masiha bina, hamara

Masiha bina, hamara,
koyi nahin apna sahara
Ye hai Prabhu mera, Ye hai Prabhu tera
Ye hai mera, Ye hai tera, Masiha, hamara.

[Verse 1]
Tere charan, tere sharan
Paawan kare hamko, dukh ke mare,
Sab hain bechare, aye tere dware
Ye hai mera, ye hai tera,
Sab ka paalan hara 'Masiha'

[Verse 2]
Thu hai tara, Yishu pyara
Sab ka paalan hara, Dukh ke mare,
Sab hain bechare, Aye tere dware
Ye hai mera, Ye hai tera, sab ka
paalan hara. 'Masiha'

title: Teri aradhana karun
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 625
[LANGUAGE] Hindi
[TITLE] Teri aradhana karun

Teri aradhana karun (2)
Pap kshamakar jeevan deydey
Daya ki yachana karun (2)
Theri araadhana karun 'Theri'

[Verse 1]
Thuhi Mahan, sarva Shakthiman
Thuhi hai mere jeevan ka sangeeth
Hriday ke tar, chedey jhankaar
Theri araadhana hai madhur geeth
Jeevan se mere thu mahima paye
Ek hi kamna karun
Pap kshamakar jeevan deydey
Daya ki yachana karun 'Theri'

[Verse 2]
Srishti ke har ek kan kan mein,
Chaaya hai teri mahima ka raaj;
Pakshi bhi karte hai teri prashansa,
Har pal sunate hain anand ka rag;
Meri bhi bhakti tujhe grahan ho,
Hriday se prarthana karun;
Pap kshamakar jeevan deydey
Daya ki yachana karun 'Theri'

[Verse 3]
Patit jeevan me jyoti jala de,
Tujh hi se lagi hain asha meri,
Paapmay tam ko dur hata de,
Purna ho abhilasha meri;
Jeevan ke kathin dukhi kshanon ka,
Dhrirta se samna karun;
Pap kshamakar jeevan deydey
Daya ki yachana karun 'Theri'

title: Thera phazal kyahai ajeeb
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 626
[LANGUAGE] Hindi
[TITLE] Thera phazal kyahai ajeeb

Thera phazal kya hai ajeeb
Mere jeevan me bada
Ab tak sambhala mujhey
Aur bhi chahiye thera phazal mujhey.

[Verse 1]
Bach gaya khathre se main
Yeh bhi hai thera phazal
Sarey pap mere mit gaye hain
Avinashi jeeven paaliya hai
Usey sambhalne ka phazal deydey mujhe
'Thera phazal'

[Verse 2]
Haleem jo hai uspar 
rahtha hai thera phazal
Is jeevan ke liye kafi hai
Thakath aur thandrusthi ke saath
Seva karneka phazal deydey mujhe
'Thera phazal'

[Verse 3]
Prabhu aaneke din mein milega
bada phazal
Jagthe huye paane ke liye
Yishu se mai milne ke liye
Daya ke hath ka phazal deydey mujhe
'Thera phazal'

title: Sari srishti ke Maalik
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 627
[LANGUAGE] Hindi
[TITLE] Sari srishti ke Maalik

[Verse 1]
Sari srishti ke Maalik Thumhi ho
Sari srishti ke Rakshak Thumhi ho
Karte hain Tujhko saadar pranaam
Gaate hain tere gun gaan

[Chorus 1]
Aa Aaa Alleluiah (7)
Aa Aa Amen

[Verse 2]
Sare Sansar ko tera sahara
Sare sankat se hamko bachaana
Tere hathon mein jeevan hamara hai
Apni raha par hamko chalana

[Verse 3]
Ham hain tere hathon ki rachana
Ham par rahe teri karuna
Tan man dhan hamara tera hai
Inhe shaitan ko chhoone na dena

[Verse 4]
Ab dur nahi hain kinara
Dhiraj ko hamare badana
Jeevan ki hamari is nayya ko
Bhavsaagar mein khone na dena.

title: Mukthi-dilaye-Yeshu naam
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 628
[LANGUAGE] Hindi
[TITLE] Mukthi-dilaye-Yeshu naam

Mukthi-dilaye-Yeshu naam '
Shanthi dilaye Yeshu naam

[Verse 1]
Charani me thoone janam liya Yeshu
Kroos par huva kurbaan

[Verse 2]
Yeshu hai dayaa ka bahetha sagar
Yeshu hai daatha mahaan

[Verse 3]
Kroos par apna khoon bahaya
Sara chukaaya daam

[Verse 4]
Hum sub ke paapon ko mitane
Yesu huwa balidaan

[Verse 5]
Hum par Yeshu krupakarna
Hum hain paapi naadaan.

title: Ay-hamare pitha
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 629
[LANGUAGE] Hindi
[TITLE] Ay-hamare pitha

Ay-hamare pitha-
Thoo jo aasman me hai
Thera naam paak mana jaaye
Theri baadshaahat aaye

[Verse 1]
Jaise theri marzi-
Aasmaan me poori hothi
Vaise hi theri marzi-
Jagath me poori hojaye

[Verse 2]
Rozki roti hamaari '
Aaj hum ko dey dey
Jeevan ki roti thoo hai-
Thoo hi hamara bal hai

[Verse 3]
Jis thara hum apne-
Aparadhi ko maaf kartey
Usi tarah thoo hamare
Aparadh ko maaf karde

[Verse 4]
Hum ko azmayishon mein
Jaane thu na dey
Balke burai se bacha
Teri rah main chala

[Verse 5]
Kyonki rajya aur parakram
Aur teri mahima
Hamesha theri hi hai
Teri rahegi hamesha.

title: Sweet hour of prayer!
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 63
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] Sweet hour of prayer!

[Verse 1]
Sweet hour of prayer!
Sweet hour of prayer!
That calls me from a world of care,
And bids me at my Father's throne,
Make all my wants and wishes known;
In seasons of distress and grief,
My soul has often found relief,
And oft escaped the tempter's snare,
By thy return, sweet hour of prayer!

[Verse 2]
Sweet hour of prayer!
Sweet hour of prayer!
Thy wings shall my petition bear,
To Him whose truth and faithfulness,
Engage the waiting soul to bless;
And since He bids me seek His face,
Believe His word and trust His grace,
I, cast on Him my ev'ry care,
And wait for thee, sweet hour of prayer

[Verse 3]
Sweet hour of prayer!
Sweet hour of prayer!
May I thy consolation share,
Till, from mount Pisgah's lofty height
I view my home, and take my flight;
This robe of flesh I'll drop, and rise,
To seize the everlasting prize;
And shout, while passing thro' the air
Farewell, farewell, sweet hour of prayer

title: Vandana kartey hain hum
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 630
[LANGUAGE] Hindi
[TITLE] Vandana kartey hain hum

[Chorus] :
Vandana kartey hain hum (2)
Hriday ko terey saamne
Laakar rakhtey hain hum

[Verse 1]
Hriday mein merey Masiha
Jeevan deep jala
Hriday ke paapon ko dhokar
Prem ki raha dikha
II Vandana II

[Verse 2]
Mai hun nirbal manav
Paapon ke saagar me khoya
Ab thum sambhalo Yeshuji
Bhavsaagar mein hun khoya
II Vandana II

title: Dharati aakaash donon
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 631
[LANGUAGE] Hindi
[TITLE] Dharati aakaash donon

Dharati aakaash donon,
Prabhu ki aawaaz sunenge,
Sansaar ke sab praani,
Us ka hi naam lenge,
Dharati aakaash donon.

[Verse 1]
Prabhu ka samay aataa hai,
Dharati magan hogi,
Uski daya barsegi,
Aur door jalan hogi;
Uske vachan ki mahima,
Aur shakti ham dekhenge,
Sansaar ke sab praani,
Us ka hi naam lenge. Dharati

[Verse 2]
Prabhu ka vachan hai aisa,
Jo chirag sa jalta hai,
Uspar koi chalata hai,
Jeevan use milta hai;
Uske niyam ko jo mane,
Kabhi bhi na woh bhatkega,
Sansaar ke sab praani,
Us ka hi naam lenge Dharati.

[Verse 3]
Aankhen uthha kar dekho,
Prabhu ka din aayega,
Usko grahan jo karega,
Wohi saath jayega;
Jisne Prabhu ko na maana,
Wohi ek din royega,
Sansaar ke sab praani,
Us ka hi naam lenge. Dharati

title: Man to Prabhu ka
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 632
[LANGUAGE] Hindi
[TITLE] Man to Prabhu ka

Man to Prabhu ka mandir hai,
Tan apna daan karo,
Apne Prabhu ki seva mein,
Sab apna daan karo.

[Verse 1]
Hai yaad tumhe janme the,
Tum paap ke sagar mein,
Aur pane tumhe aayaa,
Woh paap ke sagar mein;
Us pyare Prabhu ke naam ke liye,
Kuchh apna daan karo.

[Verse 2]
Kal tum jo bhatak gaye the,
Anjaan si raahon mein,
Woh tumko bacha laya,
Apni pyar ki baahon mein;
Jo bhi mila hai Prabhu mein tumhe,
Auron ko daan karo.

[Verse 3]
Andhkar ke jeevan mein,
Woh roshni le aayaa,
Us roshni mein hamne,
Ek maarg naya paaya;
Jeevan tumhara hai uska,
Jeevan balidaan karo.

title: Naare lagao re gaao re
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 633
[LANGUAGE] Hindi
[TITLE] Naare lagao re gaao re

Naare lagao re gaao re,
Jhanda Masih ka phairao re

Halleluiah (4)

[Verse 1]
Jeevan se uljha hua rahi,
Yeeshu ke paas tum aao re
Gum ki ye raahen sab chhoro,
Zindagi mein ab kuchh joro re.

[Verse 2]
Lamba safar zindagi ka,
Sachchaai koi na jane re.
Aankhen upar ko lagaao,
Yeeshu ke paas tum aao re.

[Verse 3]
Yeeshu kurbaan hua hai,
Paapon ka ant hua hai.
Khushiaan woh baat raha hai,
Prem ki dhara wohi hai.

title: Gin, gin ke stuti karun
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 634
[LANGUAGE] Hindi
[TITLE] Gin, gin ke stuti karun

Gin, gin ke stuti karun,
Beshumar tere danon ke liye,
Ab tak tune sambhala mujhe,
Apni bahon mein liye hue.
Gin, gin ke stuti karun.

[Verse 1]
Tere shatru ka nishana,
Tujh par hoga na safal,
Aankhon ki putli jaise,
Woh rakhega tujhe har pal.
Gin, gin'..

[Verse 2]
Aandhiyaan ban ke aayen,
Zindagi ke yeh fikr
Kaun hai tera khewanhara,
Hai bharosa tera kidhar?
Gin, gin'..

[Verse 3]
Aaye jo tujhe mitane,
Ve shastra honge be-asar
Tera rachne wala tujh par,
Rakhta hai apni nazar. Gin, gin....

title: Shoonya se le ke tune
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 635
[LANGUAGE] Hindi
[TITLE] Shoonya se le ke tune

Shoonya se le ke tune mujhe,
Rach liya apne he roop mein;
Prem kiya hai anant prem se,
Diya putra meri mukti ke liye.

Anokha pyar hai tera,
Karunga stuti teri main sarvada (2)

[Verse 2]
Jag mein aayaa Yeeshu swarg
chhorke,
Mera saara dand sah liya usne;
Kore khakhe krus uthake Yeeshu ne,
Mujhe mukti aur changai de di hai.

Anokha pyar hai tera,
Karunga stuti teri main sarvada (2)

[Verse 3]
Avinashi anant mera,
Dhanya sangati Yeeshu ke saath;
Swarg mein dhanya teri santan,
Payenge Yeeshu se jalali pyar.

Anokha pyar hai tera,
Karunga stuti teri main sarvada (2)

[Verse 4]
Ann, vastra aur sabhi aashishen,
Di mujhe tune bharpuri se;
Khatron aur sab musibaton mein,
Aankh ki putli jaise sambhala
mujhe.

Anokha pyar hai tera,
Karunga stuti teri main sarvada (2)

title: Aaj ka din Yahova ne
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 636
[LANGUAGE] Hindi
[TITLE] Aaj ka din Yahova ne

Aaj ka din Yahova ne banaya hai,
Ham isme aanandit hon, aanandit
hon.
[Verse 1]
Prabhu ko mahima mile,
Chahe ho mera apmaan.
Woh barhe main ghatun,
Rahe isi ka dhyan.
[Verse 2]
Stuti prashansa karen,
Kyon na kuchh hota rahe.
Usko ham bhaaten rahen,
Chahe jahaan bhi rahen.
[Verse 3]
Jeevan se jyoti jale,
Jeevan yeh aisa banen.
Jyoti mein chal ham saken,
Yehi dua hai tujhse.

title: O aakaash
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 637
[LANGUAGE] Hindi
[TITLE] O aakaash

O aakaash aur surya chandrama,
Stuti karo sara bhumandal.
[Verse 1]
Yeeshu ne tujh se prem kiya,
Tere liye apna praan diya;
Narak se aatma ko bacha liya,
Anant jeevan sab ko diya.
[Verse 2]
Anugrahkari priya Yeeshu,
Dharmi hokar woh dukh saha;
Hara diya bairi shaitan ko,
Mrityu par Yeeshu vijayee hua.
[Verse 3]
Dooton ne sunaya susamachar,
Yeeshu ji uthha hai zarur;
Jaake batao yeh samachar,
Baaje bajaate gaate jai-jai-kaar.

title: Mil kar ham sanna
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 638
[LANGUAGE] Hindi
[TITLE] Mil kar ham sanna

Mil kar ham sanna teri gaate,
Sare jahan ko sunate,
Jai jai ho teri Prabhu,
Mahima ho teri Prabhu,
Sab ko ham yah git sunate
[Verse 1]
Saare jahan ka sahara,
Dube huon ka (kinara) - 2,
Naiya hamari dole,
Maunjho mein khaaye (hilore) - 2,
Lechal kinare lejaa,
Ban kar tu maanjhi lejaa,
Ham sab ko paar lagaade.
[Verse 2]
Chaaron taraf hain ghataayen,
Ghanghor baadal
(hain chhayen) - 2;
Sujhe nahin ab kinara,
Tu hi hamara (sahara) - 2.
Lechal kinare lejaa
Ban kar tu maanjhi lejaa,
Ham sab ko paar lagaade.
[Verse 3]
Paapon mein jeevan hamara,
Kashton ko jhel raha hai;
Kaise bachenge saare,
Paapi yeh jeevan hamare.
To hi hamari aashaa,
Tu hi hamara raja,
Ham sab ko paar lagaade.

title: Pyar ka Masih hai sagar,
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 639
[LANGUAGE] Hindi
[TITLE] Pyar ka Masih hai sagar,

Pyar ka Masih hai sagar,
Aaja karib aaja
Jeevan woh jal ka sotha,
Aaja karib aaja
[Verse 1]
Duniya ka noor woh hai,
Dil ka surur woh hai
Kyon thuj se door woh hai?
Aaja karib aaja
[Verse 2]
Man ka tera andhera,
Ban jayega savera
Kar usme hi basera,
Aaja karib aaja
[Verse 3]
Rangeen bahar woh hai,
Sachha pyar woh hai
Man ka singaar woh hai,
Aaja karib aaja

title: What a Friend we have in Jesus
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 64
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] What a Friend we have in Jesus

[Verse 1]
What a Friend we have in Jesus,
All our sins and griefs to bear!
What a privilege to carry
Everything to God in prayer!
O, what peace we often forfeit!
O, what needless pain we bear!
All because we do not carry
Everything to God in prayer.

[Verse 2]
Have we trials and temptations?
Is there trouble anywhere?
We should never be discouraged;
Take it to the Lord in prayer.
Can we find a friend so faithful
Who will all our sorrows share?
Jesus knows our every weakness;
Take it to the Lord in prayer.

[Verse 3]
Are we weak and heavy-laden,
Cumbered with a load of care?
Precious Saviour, still our refuge '
Take it to the Lord in prayer.
Do thy friends despise, forsake thee?
Take it to the Lord in prayer;
In His arms He'll take and shield thee,
Thou wilt find a solace there.

title: Thera pyar hai mahan
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 640
[LANGUAGE] Hindi
[TITLE] Thera pyar hai mahan

Thera pyar hai mahan
Thera pyar hai jahan
Maijo phahele murdha tha

kaha

lyrics:
[NUMBER] 643

museebat bhi koi nahi

tumhara hai
Pyaare Prabhuji mere jeevan ka
sahaara hai
Jab mai gunahon me khoya tha
Paapon me bilkul soya tha
Apne pavitra lahu se,
Dhoya thu hi ne paapon ko
Dhokar mujhe ab shudh kiya
Mere hriday ko saaf kiya (2)
Tujh se jab bhi main bhatak gaya,
Jeevan ko tune sahaara diya
Accha charvaha bankar ke
Tune mujhe ab dhoond liya;
Ab se Prrabhu main gaunga
Tera samachar sanaunga (2)

title: Prabhu mera charvaaha
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 646
[LANGUAGE] Hindi
[TITLE] Prabhu mera charvaaha

Prabhu mera charvaaha,
Prabhu mera rakhwaala
Mujhe kuch ghati nahi hai (2)
Sukhdaayee jharne ke paas,
Aguvai karta hai meri;
Dharm ke maarg mein woh,
Sarvada le jaata hai. (2)
Shatruon ki upasthiti me,
Aatidhya karta hai mera;
Sir par tel se mujhe,
Abhishek karta hai mera. (2)
Ghor andhakaar se bhari,
Tharai mein ho kar chalun;
Koi haani se na darungaa,
Kyon ki Prabhu saath hai mera
Bhalai aur karuna jeevanbhar,
Nischay banee rahegi,
Prabhu ke mandir mein,
Sarvadaa main vaas karunga (2)

[LANGUAGE] Hindi

Bhent nahi kuchh laataa hun

title: Holy Father in Thy mercy
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 65
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] Holy Father in Thy mercy

[Verse 1]
Holy Father in Thy mercy,
Hear our humble prayer;
Keep our loved ones, now far
distant, neath Thy care.

[Verse 2]
Jesus, Saviour, let Thy presence
Be their light and guide;
Keep, O keep them, in their weakness,
At Thy side.

[Verse 3]
When in sorrow, when in danger,
When in loneliness,
In Thy love look down and comfort
In distress.

[Verse 4]
May the joy of Thy salvation
Be their strength and stay;
May they love and may they praise
Thee Day by day.

[Verse 5]
Holy Spirit, let Thy teaching
sanctify their life;
Send Thy grace that they may conquer,
In the strife.

[Verse 6]
Father, Son, and Holy Spirit,
God, the One in Three,
Bless them, guide them, save and
keep them, Near to Thee.

title: Tere sanmukh sheesh
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 650
[LANGUAGE] Hindi

He jag ke kartaar;
Doobe huon ko de do sahaara,
Kar do bera paar

[Verse 1]
Paap ke baadal sar par chhaye
Ghira hua toofaan,
Tum bin nayaa kaun sambhale

Aake bachaa lo praan hamare,
Jag ke khevanhaar

[Verse 2]
Janam ke andhon ko di aankhen
Rogi liye bachaaye,
Paap kshama kiye sab paapin ke,
Murde diye jilaaye,
Paapi hriday humbhi laaye,
Dho do paalanhaar.

[Verse 3]
Sundar pakshi, parwat, saagar
Sabke srijan haar,
Aake viraajo man mandir mein,
Bande karen pukaar,
Vyakul hriday tujhh ko pukaare,
Aa ja taaranhaar.

[LANGUAGE] Hindi

achchha hai

title: Tere pe baddate kadam

Tere dar pe baddate kadam,

dhun,

[Verse 4]

Tu hi data, Vishwa-Vidhata,

dhanyawad karen,

vandana karen,

[Verse 1]
Usne banaya hamen,
Woh hai hamara adhaar,
Usne di hamko saans,
Woh hai hamara udhaar,
Uski ho jai-jai, ho aradhana

[Verse 2]

title: Abba, Father! we approach Thee
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 66
[LANGUAGE] English
[TITLE] Abba, Father! we approach Thee

[Verse 1]
Abba, Father! we approach Thee
In our Saviour's precious Name;
We, Thy children, here assembling
Access to Thy presence claim.
From our sin His blood hath washed us;
'Tis through Him our souls draw near
And Thy Spirit, too, hath taught us,
'Abba, Father!'' Name so dear.

[Verse 2]
Once as prodigals we wandered,
In our folly, far from Thee;
But Thy grace, o'er sin abounding,
Rescued us from misery.
Thou the prodigals hast pardoned
Loved us with a Father's love;
Welcomed us with joy o'er flowing,
E'en to dwell with Thee above.

[Verse 3]
Clothed in garments of salvation,
At Thy table is our place;
We rejoice, and Thou rejoicest,
In the riches of Thy grace,
'It is meet'' we hear Thee saying,
'We should merry be and glad;
I have found My once lost children,
Now they live, who once were
dead.''

[Verse 4]
Abba, Father! All adore Thee,
All rejoice in heaven above;
While in us they learn the wonders
Of Thy wisdom, power, and love.
Soon, before Thy throne assembled,
All Thy children shall proclaim,
'Glory, everlasting glory,
Be to God and to the Lamb!''

title: Man ka deep jala
lyrics:

[LANGUAGE] Hindi

Yeeshu ko apna - 2

[Verse 2]
Yeh duniya hai, khwab sunehara,
Isme jo fuss jaye,
Roye, tarpe, chain na paye,
Ghul-ghul ke mar jaye
Man ka mail dhula - 2
Khwaabon mein.....

[Verse 3]
Yeeshu ko tu, apne jeewan mein,
Apna meet bana le,
Chhor de ab yeh, duniyadari,
Duniya se man tu fira le,
Hoga tera bhala - 2
Khwaabon mein....

title: Yeeshu ka prem hai

title: Naam liyo re
lyrics:
[NUMBER] 665
[LANGUAGE] Hindi

[Verse 1]
Paap harega,

[Verse 2]
Shanthi woh dega,
